H0.text: who were the children of king solomon. Rehoboam

H1.text: who were the children of king solomon. Shimea

H2.text: who were the children of king solomon. Shobab

H3.text: who were the children of king solomon. Nathan

A4.text: Solomon's son Rehoboam succeeded him, but ten of the Tribes of Israel refused him as king

A5.text: Solomon had three named full brothers born to Bathsheba: Nathan, Shammua, and Shobab

A6.text: Nathan was a court prophet in the time of King David

A7.text: Two sons of Nathan, Azariah and Zabud, are mentioned as princes and officers under Solomon (I Kings iv. 5)
